pillar.title: Law, Regulation, Ethics and Governance
pillar.definition: All rules governing anesthesia: federal/state law, CMS regulations, malpractice, institutional bylaws, ethics, informed consent, criminal misuse of drugs, DEA issues, compliance.
inclusion_tests: Is this about what is legally required, prohibited, regulated, or ethically governed?
exclusion_tests: Business strategy, compensation, workforce motivation, burnout.
